OctalBonescript.js

The most reliable JS library for your BeagleBone.

One that just works!

Introduction

OctalBonescript is a JavaScript library for controlling and programming your BeagleBone. You can create web-based applications using the power of JavaScript and control your BeagleBone right from within your browser. It runs with Node.js and supports socket.io out-of-the-box.

Fork on GitHub Node.js Package

Currently, v0.2.12

Read the Full Documentation

Salient features

OctalBonescript.js lets you do the following and more

1. Control your BeagleBone using JavaScript
2. Built standalone web-applications hosted on BeagleBone
3. Support for Arduino-like functions to control pins
4. Socket.io and Node.js compatible
5. Create software interfaces for controlling hardware
6. Continuously maintained and developed
